name: Taddy's Ribbiting Adventure
description:
Taddy's Ribbiting Adventure is a hybrid Beat-em-up Puzzle game staring Taddy.  He is on a quest to retrieve his family's jewels that were stolen by the evil Diamondback.  Use Taddy's tounge in order to defeat Snakes and Magpies as they try to stop you from solving each area's puzzle in order to reach Diamondback's lair.

Jesse Cashmer: Team Lead, Programing Lead, Level Designer.

Darlynn Best: UI/UX Lead, Programmer, Level Designer.

Gwen Collins: Art, Animation.
